articles.author: Cian Cheesbrough
articles.title: Fans poke fun as Timo Werner accidentally kicks the corner flag during Manchester City defeat - Daily Mail
articles.description: £53million striker Werner arrived at Stamford Bridge to much fanfare after shining in the Bundesliga but is now without a goal in 12 games, and the unfortunate incident seemed to sum it up.
articles.content:
Timo Werner's start to life at Chelsea went from bad to worse against Manchester City after the striker appeared to kick the flag when attempting to take a corner.
